s1.title: Trying The Batik Squiggle Browser
s1.p: You can experiment with the Batik browser by clicking on one of the following links. Note that you need to install Java(tm) Web Start on your system to run these demos.

ul.li: SVG Demos. An on-line demo of the Batik SVG Browser showing various demos
SVG Fonts Demo. An on-line demo of the Batik SVG Browser showing SVG Fonts at work"

s1.note: This version of the Batik browser is running from your browser and is subject to the same restrictions as an applet. For example, it does not have the ability to load SVG files from arbitrary locations. However, it does offer all the main features that the viewer has to offer, as explained in the Browser tutorial.
